fields.text: How do you usually get to campus?
How do you use notes/cheat sheets in exams?
How do you deal with paper consumption when studying?
By bike, e-scooter or on foot
fields.extra: Exercise in the fresh air strengthens body and mind, and clears the head before or after studying

fields.text: By public transport (e.g. bus, train, tram)
By car via car sharing or ride sharing
fields.extra: Car sharing makes the journey to campus more social, entertaining and enlivens the spirit

fields.text: With your own car or motorbike
fields.improvement: Switching to car sharing or public transport not only reduces the burden on the environment, but also gives you valuable time to read, study or unwind.

fields.text: I only use notes/cheat sheets that I need
I sometimes use more notes/cheat sheets than I need
I always have everything I can take with me, even if I don't need it

Ein rein papierbasiertes Lernen verbraucht viele Ressourcen, digitale Alternativen schonen die Umwelt und erleichtern eine übersichtliche Struktur
